entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Enhancement] Introduce a new FlyoutDisplayOptions on Shell "DisplayAsChildren" #6973
  • Redundant/incorrect Style definition for SearchHandler in MAUI boilerplate #6972
    6.0.300
  • Application.ModalPopped never fires when run in Unit Test. #6971
  • Blazor MAUI dynamic root components fail on iOS hardware #6965
    6.0.300
  • Show platform UI for alert/prompt in webviews #6963
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Changing ImageSource in MAUI app causes flicker on Windows #6962
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Alerts in Blazor and WebView on Windows do not look nice #6961
  • [ANDROID] ScrollView not increasing in height when its child ListView or CollectionView are getting more items #6959
  • Slider value property is ignored on initialization #6957
  • Offering help porting the Xamarin.forms tutorial over to .NET MAUI #6954
  • Can we create a MAUI tutorial based on the Contoso University example? #6952
  • Horizontal layout position not updated correctly while dynamically updated in windows platform #6946
  • ContentPropertyAttribute not working like Xamarin/WPF #6944
    6.0.300
  • ListView not scrolling, not selecting after update, extremely slow to update #6943
    6.0.300

Closed

  • Remove Debug.Asserts Added from this PR #6616
    6.0.300
  • Missing TextColor in MenuBar #5554
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] ContentView with ContentPresenter measured and arranged incorrectly #6808
    6.0.300
  • Shell.TitleColor is dark on top level FlyoutItem but white on secondary page #5757
    6.0.300
  • QueryProperty is not set when navigating back to page. #6698
    6.0.300
  • Can't start Blazor MAUI project rc2 #6867
  • Is there a prescribed way to include generated content files as static assets? #6904
  • Resources path in Maui should always use / and not the escape character \ which is Windows only #6926
  • SQL Server pre-login handshake failed Android 5,6,8.1 #6859
  • [Bug] Cursor Position wrong in Entry field when using IValueConverter #6948
    6.0.300
  • wrong splash screen shown under Android 12 (API 31), but is correct with Android 11 #6937
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] CollectionView.EmptyView does not raises clicked event on UWP #3013
    6.0.300
  • MenuBarItems are disappearing when navigating back from an another page #6855
    6.0.300-servicing
  • `ListView` uses the wrong style in WinUI 3 #6209
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CollectionView on Android does not show new objects if it starts with 0 objects #6386
    6.0.300
  • Icon on Alt-Tab not showing on Windows #5915
    6.0.300
  • Items do not render in CollectionView after scrolling when wrapped in ContentView #5248
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView SelectedItem not highlighted on Android until scroll #5117
    6.0.300
  • Shell Navigation with Models #6935
    Future
  • [Bug] Grid inside a StackLayout with Padding, exceeds view limit. #6451
    6.0.300
  • Grid Layout children are being clipped in Android #4011
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView taps not being processed #6075
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] ContentView not rendering until resize Window #3462
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Set WinUI picker description to title #6970
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Fix sandbox project #6968
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix WinUI fully templated RadioButton #6967
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.300
  • Fix Maui.Controls.Sample Blazor dynamic root components trimming problem. #6966
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Move loose resource items under a folder #6956
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300

Merged

  • Reenable CA1416 in Essentials #6835
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300
  • Respect BarTextColor in Windows MenuBar #6964
    area/controls 🎮, control-menubar, 6.0.300
  • Ignore content measurement requests with zero values #6969
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300
  • Include route parameters when switching flyouts #6960
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300
  • Disable ViewPager2 interaction if there are no tabs #6955
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300
  • [Housekeeping] Use IPropertyMapper in some pending handlers #6949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [WinUI] Make EmptyViewContentControl be on top so it gets click events #6951
  • Add Windows Icon to .exe and set Window Icon at runtime #6900
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300
  • Change iOS Shell pop to just use GotoAsync #6912
    6.0.300
  • Bump xunit.runner.visualstudio from 2.4.4 to 2.4.5 #6895
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 #6923
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Implement Android Platform Specifics #5831
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.2.6.1 to 1.3.0 #6809
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Apply default WinUI 3 Styles #6947
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, 6.0.300
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1185.39 to 1.0.1210.30 #6779
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.4.1.1 to 2.4.2 #6777
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 #6922
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.1 to 0.11.2 #6921
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tizen] Update Background implements #6945
    platform/tizen

Updated

  • [iOS] Implement iOS Platform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to childrens #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, do-not-merge, 6.0.300
  • iOS modals use `Window.ModalNavigationManager` vs `Application.NavigationProxy` #6813
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert, 6.0.300
  • Remove FontImageExtension #5012
    area/Xaml </>, area/fonts 🅰️, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Remove Frame arrange/measure overrides #6794
    area/layout 🔲, control-frame, 6.0.300
  • Uncomment Editor TextChanges Test #6930
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Correctly size the ImageButton BitmapImage #6663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Fragment from 2.4.1.2 to 2.4.2 #6774
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
